channel.title: Civil War on Iiams Family Genealogy
channel.description: Recent content in Civil War on Iiams Family Genealogy

item.title: Who was Raleigh Brown Ijams (1858-1907)?
item.description: Raleigh Brown Ijams was born into a wealthy family in modern day West Virginia, raised in Baltimore and later lived in Manhattan. He engaged in a variety of business ventures. He never married, nor had any children, and died at a relatively young age of 48. Fortunately, through his appreciation of a young Helen Keller, we learn much more about Raleigh.
